title: This is a great reason to update the Facebook app today
text:
This is a great reason to update the Facebook app today 
CBS News Saturday 24th October, 2015 
The company addressed the common complaint from iPhone users in a blog post Thursday and released an update to the iOS app to correct it. (The Android version, by the way, also...
